description: Verify ArgumentQualityClient can be initialized with an API key
test_steps: Create ArgumentQualityClient instance with API key parameter
Verify instance is created successfully
Verify instance type is ArgumentQualityClient or equivalent
verification: Client instance created without errors and has expected type

description: Verify run method accepts list of dictionaries with sentence and topic keys
test_steps: Create valid input: [{'sentence': 'Test sentence', 'topic': 'Test topic'}]
Call run method with valid input
Verify method accepts input without raising error
verification: Method accepts properly formatted input without error

test_steps: Create input with empty sentence: [{'sentence': '', 'topic': 'Test topic'}]
Call run method with invalid input
Verify an error is raised
Verify error indicates validation failure
verification: System raises appropriate error for empty sentence input

test_steps: Create input with empty topic: [{'sentence': 'Test sentence', 'topic': ''}]
Call run method with invalid input
Verify an error is raised
Verify error indicates validation failure
verification: System raises appropriate error for empty topic input

description: Verify output is a list of numeric scores
test_steps: Create valid input with 3 sentence-topic pairs
Call run method
Verify return value is a list
Verify list contains numeric values
Verify each value can be used in numeric comparisons
verification: Output is list of numeric values suitable for quality ranking

description: Verify output length matches input length
test_steps: Create input with N sentence-topic pairs (e.g., N=5)
Call run method
Count number of scores in output
Verify output length equals N
verification: Output list length exactly matches input list length

description: Verify output order corresponds to input order
test_steps: Create input with distinguishable pairs: [pair_A, pair_B, pair_C]
Call run method and capture scores: [score_A, score_B, score_C]
Swap input order: [pair_B, pair_A, pair_C]
Call run method again and capture new scores
Verify score positions moved with their corresponding pairs
verification: Score at position i corresponds to input pair at position i

description: Verify system processes single item correctly
test_steps: Create input with 1 sentence-topic pair
Call run method
Verify returns list with 1 score
Verify processing completes successfully

description: Verify system processes multiple items correctly
test_steps: Create input with 10 sentence-topic pairs
Call run method
Verify returns list with 10 scores
Verify all items are processed (no missing scores)
verification: Multi-item batch is fully processed with correct output count

test_steps: Create valid input
Call run method with timeout parameter (e.g., timeout=30)
Verify method accepts timeout parameter without error
Verify processing completes
verification: Timeout parameter is accepted by run method

description: Verify client is accessible via factory pattern
test_steps: Create factory instance with API key
Obtain ArgumentQualityClient through factory method
Verify returned object is ArgumentQualityClient instance
Verify client is functional (can call run method)
verification: Client can be obtained and used via factory pattern

description: Verify dictionaries are transformed correctly for processing
test_steps: Create input: [{'sentence': 'S1', 'topic': 'T1'}, {'sentence': 'S2', 'topic': 'T2'}]
Call run method
Verify processing completes successfully
Verify output has 2 scores corresponding to 2 inputs
verification: Dictionary inputs are correctly transformed and processed maintaining correspondence

description: Verify client inherits batch processing capability
test_steps: Create ArgumentQualityClient instance
Create input with multiple items (tests batch capability)
Call run method
Verify batch processing works (all items processed)
Verify this capability comes from base class architecture
verification: Client demonstrates batch processing inherited from base

description: Verify client connects to scoring service
test_steps: Create ArgumentQualityClient with valid API key
Create valid input with recognizable sentence-topic pair
Call run method
Verify scores are returned (proves service connectivity)
Verify scores are numeric quality values
verification: Client successfully communicates with scoring service and receives valid responses

description: Verify client provides only quality scoring, not other services
test_steps: Inspect ArgumentQualityClient public interface
Verify run method exists for quality scoring
Verify no claim detection methods exist
Verify no evidence detection methods exist
Verify no other NLP service methods exist
verification: Client has single-purpose interface for quality scoring only

description: Verify scores differentiate between quality levels
test_steps: Create input with high-quality argument: {'sentence': 'Autonomous vehicles reduce traffic accidents by eliminating human error', 'topic': 'autonomous vehicles'}
Create input with low-quality argument: {'sentence': 'cars cars cars', 'topic': 'autonomous vehicles'}
Call run method with both inputs
Verify high-quality argument receives higher score
Verify scores are sufficiently different to be meaningful
verification: System produces differentiated scores that reflect argument quality

description: Verify required keys are enforced in input dictionaries
test_steps: Create input missing 'sentence' key: [{'topic': 'Test topic'}]
Attempt to call run method
Verify error is raised for missing required key
verification: System validates presence of required dictionary keys

description: Verify batch requests contain all input pairs
test_steps: Create input with 5 distinct sentence-topic pairs
Call run method
Verify all 5 pairs are processed (5 scores returned)
Verify each score corresponds to its pair (order maintained)
verification: All input pairs are included in batch request and processed
